reuters.title: GCA CORP <GCA> YEAR
reuters.body: Shr loss 1.77 dlrs vs loss 10.47 dlrs Net loss 24.9 mln vs loss 123.1 mln Revs 123.1 mln vs 156.5 mln NOTE:1985 loss includes loss of 51.2 mln dlrs from discontinued operations. 1986 loss includes gain of 6.8 mln dlrs from discontinued operations. Reuter 
